mapper.select:
SELECT m.menu_name as menuName, count(*) as counts FROM menu m inner join sub_sell s
ON m.menu_code = s.menu_code
GROUP BY m.menu_name
ORDER BY counts desc LIMIT 0,5
mapper.update: UPDATE sub_sell SET sub_sell_final = "Y", sub_sell_final_date = NOW() WHERE sub_sell_code = #{subSellCode}
mapper.select: SELECT sub_sell_code ,menu_code ,sub_sell_group ,sub_sell_date ,sub_sell_practical_selling_price ,total_account_group ,sub_sell_final ,sub_sell_final_date ,pay_method ,sub_code ,event_code ,sub_staff_code ,sub_sell_final_staff ,sub_sell_cost FROM sub_sell WHERE sub_sell_code = #{subSellCode}

SELECT m.menu_code as menuCode, m.menu_name as menuName, m.menu_ingre_price as menuIngrePrice, m.menu_selling_price as menuSellingPrice, m.menu_regit_date as menuRegitDate, m.event_code as eventCode, m.head_staff_id as headStaffId , e.event_discount_rate as eventDiscountRate, e.event_name as eventName FROM menu m inner join event e
ON m.event_code = e.event_code
